column3: Latest; Svay Rieng (Xinhua) – At least 58 Chinese nationals have been detained by Cambodian police and local authorities from three casinos in Svay Rieng province on January 21
column4: 2019. The 58 were identified as involved in online extortion. ------ All these Chinese people caught up in three casinos
column8: the 58 Chinese nationals have been sent to the Immigration Department of the Ministry of Interior.
